import React from "react"; import moment from 'moment'; import { VscHeart } from 'react-icons/vsc' import { FcLike} from 'react-icons/fc' import { BsFillSuitHeartFill } from 'react-icons/bs' import { AiOutlineDelete } from 'react-icons/ai'; const Post = ({post}) => { console.log(post.selectedFile) return (
{/* {post.tags.map((tag) => `#${tag} `)} */}

Felipe Sacudon

{moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()}

{post.title}

{ post.likeCount == 0 ? : } {post.likeCount}
) } export default Post;
